contentrichtext.text: '''University Station''' may refer to any of the following railway stations: <!-- alphabetize by country then city --> '''In Canada''' *[[University (C-Train)]], a light rail station serving the University of Calgary, in Calgary, Canada *[[University LRT Station]], a light rail station serving the University of Alberta, in Edmonton, Canada '''In Hong Kong''' *[[University Station (MTR)]], serving the Chinese University of Hong Kong, in Sha Tin District, in the New Territories, Hong Kong *[[Hong Kong University Station]], a railway station ''under construction'' to serve the [[University of Hong Kong]], in the Central and Western District, Hong Kong '''In Malaysia''' *[[Universiti LRT station]], a light rail station serving the University of Malaya, in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia '''In Mexico''' *[[Universidad (Monterrey Metro)]], a subway station serving the Autonomous University of Nuevo León, in San Nicolás de los Garza, Nuevo León, Mexico '''In Russia''' *[[Universitet (Moscow Metro)]], serving Moscow State University, in Moscow, Russia '''In Sweden''' *[[Universitetet railway station]], serving Stockholm University, in Stockholm, Sweden *[[Universitetet metro station]], a metro station serving Stockholm University, in Stockholm, Sweden '''In Taiwan''' *[[Fu Jen University Station]], a railway station to serve the [[Fu Jen Catholic University]], in New Taipei, Taiwan. *[[Chang Jung Christian University Station]], a railway station to serve the [[Chang Jung Christian University]], in Tainan, Taiwan. '''In Ukraine''' *[[Universytet (Kharkiv Metro)]], serving Kharkiv National University, in Kharkiv, Ukraine *[[Universytet (Kiev Metro)]], serving Taras Shevchenko National University, in Kiev, Ukraine '''In the United Kingdom''' *[[University (Birmingham) railway station]], serving the University of Birmingham, in Birmingham, United Kingdom *[[University halt]], serving the University of Ulster at Coleraine, in Coleraine, Northern Ireland *[[University Metro station]], a station on the Tyne and Wear Metro, serving the University of Sunderland in the United Kingdom '''In the United States''' *[[University (Metro Rail)]], a metro station serving the University at Buffalo, in Buffalo, New York *[[University (Metrorail station)]], serving the University of Miami, in Coral Gables, Florida {{disambig}} [[cs:Universitet]] [[it:Universitet]] [[ru:Университет (значения)]] [[uk:Університет (значення)]] [[zh-yue:大學站]] [[zh:大學站 (消歧義)]]
